short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily save and access important links or text snippets that need to be accessed regularly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Constantly needing to access a piece of text or a link for example, but having issues always finding it? Copy Ninja will allow users to save often needed links or text inputs that can be easily copied to the users clipboard.
